response.overview: Territory, a short film about the negotiation of intimate space and emotional inequality. He is hitting her until she gives in. She is hitting him until he gives in.  The images were created within the experiment “The user”: An anonymes artist offered himself to be used by me. For one week I had the full rights over his l body and skills. There were some rules though. I am not allowed to use his name anywhere. I was not allowed to evaluate the working time with him. And he won’d talk about what we did ever. That is how I used him: Territory.  a film by MELLI MÜLLER starring MELLI MÜLLER starring ANONYMOUS MAN edited by SABINE MAAS // SMAAS UNITED poster design by DEBORAH GEPPER
response.title: Territory
